channel.title: International: Top News And Analysis
channel.description: CNBC International is the world leader for news on business, technology, China, trade, oil prices, the Middle East and markets.

item.title: 'God help Ukraine': How JD Vance's VP nomination will cause chills in Kyiv
item.description: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump's decision to pick Sen. JD Vance as his vice presidential running mate will have sent chills down spines in Kyiv.

item.title: Deutsche Bank criticized by German regulator for financial reporting error
item.description: Deutsche Bank incorrectly disclosed deferred tax assets in its 2019 financial statement, German regulator BaFin said Tuesday.

item.title: Hugo Boss shares plunge 9% as firm cuts 2024 guidance amid slumping China demand
item.description: Shares of Hugo Boss fell as much as 10% in morning trade Tuesday after the company cut its sales outlook.

item.title: The next front in U.S.-China tech battle? Underwater cables that power the global internet
item.description: With tech tensions between the U.S. and China rising, vast networks of underwater cables are becoming a new source of strain in international relations.

item.title: Bank of America tops estimates on better-than-expected investment banking
item.description: CEO Brian Moynihan told investors in April that net interest income would bottom in the second quarter.

item.title: Gareth Southgate steps down as England manager after Euro 2024 final defeat to Spain
item.description: The news comes two days after England's Euro 2024 final defeat to Spain.

item.title: Trump lauded at Republican convention, his first public appearance since assassination attempt
item.description: Trump wore a bandage over his right ear, but appeared to be in good spirits.As he walked into the convention, the Republican crowd erupted into cheering.

item.title: Foreign carmakers in China face 'increasingly precarious' position, consultancy says
item.description: New tariffs on Chinese EVs don't help foreign automakers stay competitive, especially in the lucrative China market, says business consultancy AlixPartners.

item.title: Apple releases iOS 18 public beta for iPhone — Here's what's new and how to get it
item.description: The iOS 18 preview is a beta version of the software that will launch alongside new iPhones this fall.

item.title: The Ambani wedding is costing millions — here's how to have a big impact on a much smaller budget
item.description: Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's wedding cost millions, but wedding planners say you can have a glamorous wedding on a much smaller budget.

item.title: Powell indicates Fed won't wait until inflation is down to 2% before cutting rates
item.description: Monday was Powell's first public speaking appearance since the consumer price index report for June showed cooling inflation.

item.title: Money launderers are increasingly turning to crypto to conceal flow of funds, Chainalysis says
item.description: The report said these criminals are using crypto because crypto is "cross-border, virtually instant, and generally inexpensive to transact."

item.title: Asia-Pacific markets mixed after Fed Chair Powell's rate cut comments lift Wall Street
item.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said the central bank will not wait until inflation hits 2% to cut interest rates.

item.title: 'Luxury shame': China's rich shy away from flaunting their wealth amid economic jitters
item.description: China's rich are cautious about flaunting their wealth as the economy faces headwinds, putting the country's luxury market under pressure.

item.title: Protests will 'absolutely' spread if European cities don’t address overtourism, says UNESCO official
item.description: Protests in Spain will spread if officials fail to rebalance the interests of locals and travelers, UNESCO's Peter Debrine told CNBC's "Squawk Box Asia."

item.title: Elon Musk plans to give $45 million a month to pro-Trump super PAC, WSJ reports
item.description: Elon Musk, the CEO of Tesla and SpaceX, officially endorsed Donald Trump shortly after Trump survived an assassination attempt at a campaign rally.

item.title: JD Vance is Trump's VP pick after Rubio and Burgum were passed over for running mate
item.description: Donald Trump has selected Sen. JD Vance of Ohio as his presidential running mate.

item.title: Biden says 'time to put Trump in the bulls-eye' remark was a mistake, doubles down on reelection bid
item.description: Donald Trump suffered a minor ear injury after an assassination attempt at his Pennsylvania rally that killed one attendee and critically injured two others.

item.title: Goldman Sachs tops estimates on better-than-expected fixed income trading
item.description: Goldman Sachs topped expectations for profit and revenue on better-than-expected fixed income results and smaller-than-expected loan loss provisions.

item.title: CNBC Daily Open: Trump picks VP, Dow record close, bitcoin 'digital gold'
item.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average closed at an all-time high after former President Donald Trump survived an assassination attempt.

item.title: China's beer market, the world's largest, set for bounce as drinkers go high-end
item.description: CGS International expects a recovery in beer consumption in the latter part of the year following a likely decline in volumes in the first half compared to 2023.

item.title: Special counsel Jack Smith to appeal Trump classified documents case dismissal by Judge Aileen Cannon
item.description: The ruling by Judge Aileen Cannon in the classified documents case by Jack Smith against Donald Trump came days after Trump's attempted assassination.

item.title: Secret Service director rejects calls to resign after Trump assassination attempt
item.description: Donald Trump said he was grazed by a bullet at a Pennsylvania rally where one attendee was killed and two were critically injured.

item.title: Bitcoin jumps as markets see increased odds of election victory for pro-crypto Trump
item.description: Investors said over the weekend they expected so-called "Trump victory trades" to receive a boost.

item.title: BlackRock's ETF business just keeps growing, but the search for revenue goes on
item.description: Larry Fink's gamble on Barclays' iShares ETF business has proven to be one of the greatest financial investments of all time.

item.title: Crypto stocks like Coinbase and MicroStrategy soar, mirroring rally in bitcoin
item.description: Shares of Coinbase, MicroStrategy and Riot Platforms surged on Monday as bitcoin hits a two-week high.

item.title: Trump Media shares close up more than 30% after assassination attempt
item.description: The stock's rise comes two days after the attempted assassination of former President Donald Trump, the company's majority shareholder.

item.title: Markets expected to get a short-term boost after Trump survives shooting
item.description: U.S. stocks are expected to get a short-term boost in the aftermath of the failed assassination of former president Donald Trump over the weekend.

item.title: Burberry shares drop 16% after the luxury giant issues profit warning and replaces CEO
item.description: Shares in Burberry plunged Monday after a disappointing first-quarter performance led it to issue a profit warning, replace its CEO and axe its dividend.

item.title: World leaders condemn assassination attempt on Trump: 'Tragedy for democracy'
item.description: World leaders have joined together to condemn the assassination attempt on former U.S. President Donald Trump at a Pennsylvania rally over the weekend.
